PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

nodes.body:
I added a couple small changes, feel free to revert them if you don't like them. I felt that it was right to prime the `IsUnit` version of the `scaleRoots_dvd` lemma, because we have the `iff` statement with the same requirements later on anyways. I also added some dot notation because I love that stuff.

maintainer merge

```suggestion
  ext n; simp only [coeff_smul, coeff_scaleRoots, coeff_add, smul_eq_mul,
```

some of these `simp?` suggestions are a bit broken right now sadly

this deserves a docstring, and I wouldn't be against a `NoZeroDivisors` version of all the below. it took me a while to realise why we need the power of `r`, and I'm honestly not sure where stuff pops up (I think I just need to pick my favourite ring with zero divisors and run some examples to figure that out, though)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Add lemmas about `Polynomial.scaleRoots`.

nodes.body:
I added a couple small changes, feel free to revert them if you don't like them. I felt that it was right to prime the `IsUnit` version of the `scaleRoots_dvd` lemma, because we have the `iff` statement with the same requirements later on anyways. I also added some dot notation because I love that stuff.
